verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Brethren, come see the tomb where Jesus lay;
The stone's been rolled away,
The stone's been rolled away.
Death could not hold Him, much less the grave,
Since that stone's been rolled away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And now He's risen, and now He's reigning,
And within my heart He's singing songs of praise.
And now He's risen, and now He's reigning,
Since that stone's been rolled away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord roll that stone away;
Release me from that grave.
Make this hardened heart of mine
Soft as potter's clay,
And, Oh Lord, shed abroad
This precious love of God.
Oh Lord, roll that stone away.
